thread.title: Live penguins marched onto the ice before the NHL Stadium Series game
thread.title_full: Live penguins marched onto the ice before the NHL Stadium Series game

author: Pat Iversen
title: Live penguins marched onto the ice before the NHL Stadium Series game
text:
It’s not even March yet!
The Penguins and Flyers were all set to play a pretty memorable rivalry game outdoors at Heinz Field on Saturday. 
But then A GAGGLE FLOCK WADDLE OF PENGUINS APPEARED! 
Betcha didn't know that actual penguins were playing the Flyers tonight. #StadiumSeries pic.twitter.com/SZXrbpt1aK 
— NHL on NBC (@NHLonNBCSports) February 26, 2017 Yes, the Penguins mascot hung out with actual penguins before the game. It’s a hockey dream come to life. 
ACTUAL PENGUINS! #StadiumSeries pic.twitter.com/7VA5o9NKCR 
— NHL (@NHL) February 26, 2017 Also, those Penguins had to be freaking out. So many people! So many noises! And a HUGE PENGUIN!
